meanings.sent1: The duelled knights were ready for their battle.
meanings.sent2: The duelled opponents faced each other with swords drawn.
meanings.sent3: The duelled fighters wore fancy outfits for their duel.
meanings.sent4: The duelled warriors stood face to face, ready to fight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the duelled combatants remained etched in his mind.

meanings.sent1: He duelled bravely to defend his honor.
meanings.sent2: The two friends duelled playfully with foam swords.
meanings.sent3: She duelled with her brother over who got the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The politicians duelled in a war of words during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The duelled samurais clashed in a fierce battle.
